name: Crowne Plaza Istanbul Asia

reviews.text: This hotel have a grat level ofquality and a reasonable price. Wonderful gym and sauna. The hotel is connected to a mall with some small resturant and several shop. Note this hotel is far from Old istanbul but very close to SAW airport (not Ataturk). The hotel is a real 5-star bran new.
reviews.title: Very confortable hotel for business in Istanbul Asian Area

reviews.text: This hotel offers excellent facilities. Spacious rooms, health spa, indoor pool. However, its location is only suitable for people who have either business in the area or are transitting from Sabiha airport, the second airport in Istanbul. Depending on traffic, it can take up to 1.5 hours by taxi to Istanbul down town.
reviews.title: Excellent facilities but far away from town

reviews.text: Breakfast is buffet style and very nice, great selection. The hotel restaurant is a bit formal and the bar is inside the restaurant and not on its own.
reviews.title: No English speakers and no air conditioning

reviews.text: The hotel is situated right next to a huge outlet shopping mall. The staff overall are very friendly and like to please.
reviews.title: Turkish Delight

reviews.text: Hotel infrastructure itself is very nice.
reviews.title: nice new hotel

reviews.text: I found my stay at this hotel to be a mix of pleasure and pain with some nice features let down by some terrible policies and service.
reviews.title: Could be great, sadly isn't.

reviews.text: My room on the second floor was very spacious, bright with a large comfortable king-size bed and well-appointed bathroom with two showers, one walk-in and one in the bath. A decent sized LCD TV (that I didn't actually use) and a large window overlooking the shopping outlets.
reviews.title: Nice Place

reviews.text: Hotel is beautiful - everything is of a high quality - rooms are well equipped and elegant. Used the hotel, spa, pool & gym - first class facilities. Unlike previous reviewer, I had no language problems except an amusing conversation with the young waitress at breakfast (two and tea sound very similar) The hotel offer a free shuttle to and from the nearby Sabiha airport (carefull, Istanbul has 2 airports an hour apart!)
reviews.title: Smart hotel - expensive food & drinks

reviews.text: My only criticism was the price of food and especially drink! €3 for water & coke, €7 for 1/2 a beer! If you walk towards the lake in the Mall next to the hotel (exit hotel at -2 level) there are several restaurants that charge normal prices.
reviews.title: Fantastic! Great Value and beats many other 5 Stars !!

reviews.text: I was amazed by what I got from this hotel in terms of value v/s the price I paid for it. I travelled in August 2011 and it was GREAT VALUE !
reviews.title: Nice hotel for business trip in Eastern Istanbul

reviews.text: Quite new hotel, located next to an outlet mall and amusement center. Due to its location (almost 2h drive to the center of Istanbul with "regular" traffic jam), it is more dedicated to business trips in this area (Eastern Istanbul, Gebze…).
reviews.title: Nice

reviews.text: We stayed for 3 nights in This hotel and its a very comfotable property : Best part is that its attached to a very big shopping mall so all shopping can be done with nice brands there , also families with kids are kept busy in a attached theme park which is very convienent for kids ..
reviews.title: Nice Hotel on asia side for families

reviews.text: Large rooms , wifi free of charge , good restaurant and nice spread of breakfast

reviews.text: Its very good for people who land at the second airport of istanbul .. on asia side and those who are connecting to other points in istanbul.. through that second airport ..

aka: Crowne Plaza Istanbul Asia Hotel Istanbul
description: Welcome to the Crowne Plaza Istanbul Asia where you will experience a high level of personalised service, plus a memorable stay. This exclusive new property offers luxurious, easy transportation, shopping, unlimited entertainment and everything you need. Experience Crowne Plaza Istanbul Asia - an unforgettable five-star hotel is close to Sabiha Gokcen International Airport , Formula Circuit and down town , located in the Asian Side of Istanbul , one of the city’s most prestigious neighborhoods where business meets leisure . Featuring exceptional accommodations and impeccable service with fully equiped convention and expo center , guests at this luxury hotel in Istanbul can enjoy soothing spa services at the Health and Fitness Center or dine at one of the hotel’s three distinctive restaurants. Perfectly located between upscale shopping and the city’s most renowned businesses, Crowne Plaza Istanbul Asia is a luxurious retreat in one of the world’s finest destinations. Crowne Plaza Istanbul Asia with the high quality of services offered a new dimension in the hospitality sector.
